template.name: BASIS OPTIONS
template.comment: BASIS OPTIONS ------------- GBASIS=N21 IGAUSS= 3 POLAR=COMMON NDFUNC= 0 NFFUNC= 0 DIFFSP= F NPFUNC= 0 DIFFS= F BASNAM=
BASIS OPTIONS ------------- GBASIS=N31 IGAUSS= 6 POLAR=POPN31 NDFUNC= 0 NFFUNC= 0 DIFFSP= F NPFUNC= 0 DIFFS= F BASNAM=
BASIS OPTIONS ------------- GBASIS=N31 IGAUSS= 6 POLAR=POPN31 NDFUNC= 1 NFFUNC= 0 DIFFSP= F NPFUNC= 0 DIFFS= F BASNAM=
BASIS OPTIONS ------------- GBASIS=N311 IGAUSS= 6 POLAR=POPN311 NDFUNC= 3 NFFUNC= 1 DIFFSP= T NPFUNC= 2 DIFFS= T BASNAM=
BASIS OPTIONS ------------- GBASIS=G3L IGAUSS= 6 POLAR=POPN311 NDFUNC= 0 NFFUNC= 1 DIFFSP= T NPFUNC= 0 DIFFS= T BASNAM=

transform.xpath: ./cml:list[contains(@cmlx:templateRef, 'basis' )]/*/cml:scalar
